WRITING.TITLE: Interview with WE manager + Akali Translator
Looking for some episodes, help!
WRITING.TEXT: Hi guys! I really like Top Gear but I don't have time to watch all of the seasons and epiosdes. And probably I wouldn't like all of them cause I'm not a a big fan of motorization stuff. That beign said, I really love episodes where they go for a big trip or something like that, for example the North Pole (I think it was the North Pole). Recently I've watched 21x03, where they went to the Ukraine (I really liked that one!) and some more but I can't really remeber I think one more special or something like that. My question is, can you guys help me find some more really cool and funny episodes, similar to ones I've already watched? I'd really love to watch them but I don't know if there are any of kind that I'm looking for. Can you please recommend me something? I would really appreciate that. Sorry for my english, it's not my native language. Thanks for any advices and help.

WRITING.TITLE: Which belt to choose, help!
WRITING.TEXT: Hi guys! Recently I looted a new belt and now I don't know which one to choose. Here's the screenshot of them: http://i.imgur.com/PWs9gb4.png?1 I was thinking that I would choose more thoughness cause it's really much and also because Witching Hour gives AS and I would not loose ma AP as badly etc. What do you guys think?

WRITING.TITLE: Question about elemental dmg bonus.
WRITING.TEXT: Hello! I was just wondering. I got an ammy, that is decreasing my dmg by 11% but it'd increase my arcane dmg by 16%. When all of my dmg's Arcane element, does it mean that it's better to loose that general 11% of dmg for 16% increased Arcane dmg? It's really bodering me how it really is and how it's really working. Thanks for any advince and help!

WRITING.TITLE: Question about comic books.
WRITING.TEXT: Hey guys, I'm a big fan of a tv show, but now while we all need to wait for a new season I'd like to read some comic books and here comes my question. I'd like to start the comic books series at the moment, when season 4 has ended. But I don't know which comic it'd be. Can you guys help find it? Thanks alot and also I apologise for my english, it's not my native language.

WRITING.TITLE: Question about Crusader after 2.0.4
WRITING.TEXT: Hi guys, I wanted to play a Crusader, but just saw a plenty of gameplays and articeles about him beign weak, and just didin't touched that class that much. Now, when 2.0.4 is on the way (for those who dosen't know, here is the link: http://www.diablofans.com/news/48018-diablo-3-reaper-of-souls-first-patch-2-0-4) I was just wondering. Will those buffs buff Crusader a lot? Will they touch any of his mobility, wrath as a spender and just overall dmg? I just don't know much about a class and his skills so I'd like to get some answers and opinions from you guys. Thanks!

WRITING.TITLE: I think that something's wrong with New Tristam
WRITING.TEXT: I was about to do some bounties on A1 after I did rifts, teleported to New Tristam and this's how Tristam looks for me, lol: http://imgur.com/a/oSB0P and I'm now even kidding, I was online, my internet connection was fine, everything was good. I think that this is a real NEW Tristam.

WRITING.TITLE: Let's develop a new community! Miner's.
WRITING.TEXT: Hey guys! I'd like to invite you for new community for Miner's power leveling people. It's on EU. I know we got a community about powerleveling in general, but it's spammed by people that want powerlvl in other ways then this quest. If you don't know what this is all about then look up this video, it's really good and fast way to lvl up: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=39hf-ZEtPcA Community is called Miner's Powerlvling. Come and join us! And again it's only on EU.

WRITING.TITLE: Can't decide which follower to use, help!
WRITING.TEXT: Hi guys! I need some help. Recently I got two legenadries for my follower, focus for enchantress and relic for templar. Thing is that focus for enchantress gives her immortality, and relic gives templar access to all skills. What is better for my class (I'm crusader) and generally? Screenshot http://i.imgur.com/qaH7ec4.jpg?1 I'd appreciate any kind of advice.

WRITING.TITLE: [Important] Bug with Crusader Steed Charge
WRITING.TEXT: Hey guys. I just recognized really important and annoying bug with Crusader Steed Charge. While you're on a horse and you'll try to pick up Nephalem Glory while on it, the Nephalem Glory will disappear and you'll not get a buff from it. Is it just me or everyone got it? I tested it and it's the same every time, while I'm on Steed Charge I will "pick up" globe but not get a buff from it. Help and spread it!

WRITING.TITLE: Looking for some help, coming back after a long break.
WRITING.TEXT: Hello guys! I'm coming back to Diablo after a long break. I left the game probably when 2.1.0 was at first introduced or maybe even before it. Anyway I can't get in tack of all the things that changed, there's so many of em... I know I could google everysingle one but I'd like to know everything from some good source. Can I ask you guys for help? Can someone post/link some tl;dr patch notes, main things that changed or things that I need to know about those new realms, goblins and stuff. Thanks. #edit: typo

WRITING.TITLE: Will we see Morgan at mid-season finale?
Deman is leaving Riot Games as a shoutcaster
WRITING.TEXT: https://www.facebook.com/DemanHD/posts/798305413559849 For those who dosen't have access to facebook: "This might come as a surprise to a lot of you but today I have left Riot Games as a shoutcaster. I've thoroughly enjoyed my time and the opportunities offered to me over the last 2 years at Riot Games with everyone that's worked so hard on making eSports for League of Legends become the huge success it now is. It's been such a great change to my life from the 9 to 5 office job that I used to have, to seeing and covering the last 4 seasons all around the world. 2 years ago in December I joined Riot Games as the first #8220;Rioter #8221; in Cologne to work on the new LCS project in collaboration with Turtle Entertainment (ESL). I was happy to take this leap of faith as I had worked with ESL for 2 years prior on the Intel Extreme Masters events and had a solid trust of everyone involved. I have no doubt that had the studio stayed in Cologne I would not have made this change, but now my life is in Cologne and I have chosen to take the opportunity to work alongside Joe Miller in his new position at ESL and help guide the excellent casting team they have. Thanks to everyone that has supported me throughout my casting career online and offline at events. I shall continue to cast League of Legends when possible with ESL, this is not the end for me, quite the opposite as I plan to go on for many years covering many other games."

WRITING.TITLE: Joe Miller and Deman are leaving Riot Games as a shoutcasters
WRITING.TEXT: They posted it on facebook already. Deman: https://www.facebook.com/DemanHD/posts/798305413559849 Joe Miller: https://www.facebook.com/JoeMillerOfficial/posts/767682216603084

I want to know what is beign changed in 2.1.2, I would like to watch some Diablo III YT explaining patch notes and changes, but I don't know channel of that kind. Can you please help me? Thanks!

I'm looking for some firendly, english people that may help me to come back and play with :) Hope that someone will respond to this :D gl amp;hf
